acorn.where: Common drop from trees and squirrels in wooded areas.

amber.where: Break ore deposits across Hyrule (notably Eldin and Hebra foothills).

ancient-core.where: Rare drop from Guardians and mini Guardians in shrines.

ancient-gear.where: Dropped by most Guardians (including Decayed Guardians you can search) and found in some chests. Also sold by the wandering merchant Teli.

ancient-screw.where: Common drop from broken Guardian parts and mini Guardians.

ancient-shaft.where: Dropped by most Guardians (including Decayed Guardians you can search) and found in some chests. Also sold by the wandering merchant Teli.

ancient-spring.where: Common drop from destroyed Guardians and Guardian Stalkers.

blue-nightshade.where: Grows at night in forests around Kakariko Village.

bokoblin-guts.where: Rare drop from strong Bokoblins in late-game areas.

courser-bee-honey.where: Shoot beehives in forests near Hateno and Faron.

diamond.where: Rare ore deposits (Hebra, Eldin); reward from certain shrines.

dinraals-claw.where: Shoot Dinraal's claw during its route (Eldin Great Skeleton → Tanagar Canyon).

dinraals-scale.where: Shoot Dinraal's body during its route (Eldin Great Skeleton → Tanagar Canyon).

electric-keese-wing.where: Dropped by Electric Keese (commonly in Gerudo and Lanayru areas).

energetic-rhino-beetle.where: Found on tree trunks (common in Akkala and Dueling Peaks / West Necluda forests). Stealth helps.

faroshs-claw.where: Shoot Farosh's claw (commonly farmed near Lake Floria / Riola Spring, or Lake Hylia in the Faron region).

faroshs-scale.where: Shoot Farosh's body (commonly farmed near Lake Floria / Riola Spring, or Lake Hylia in the Faron region).

fire-keese-wing.where: Dropped by Fire Keese around Eldin volcano.

fireproof-lizard.where: Under rocks near the Southern Mine in Eldin.

flint.where: Break ore deposits; plentiful around mountains.

giant-ancient-core.where: Rare drop from Guardian Stalkers and shrine mini bosses.

hearty-bass.where: Lakes around Necluda and Hyrule Ridge; use bombs or arrows.

hightail-lizard.where: Common under rocks on roads in West Necluda.

hinox-guts.where: Dropped by Hinox and Stalnox bosses.

hinox-toenail.where: Drop from Hinox after destroying their feet.

hinox-tooth.where: Dropped by Hinox; target the mouth when they fall.

hot-footed-frog.where: Near ponds after rain in West Necluda.

hyrule-bass.where: Common fish in most rivers and ponds.

ice-keese-wing.where: Dropped by Ice Keese in Hebra and Gerudo Highlands.

icy-lizalfos-tail.where: Dropped by Ice Lizalfos in Hebra and Gerudo Highlands.

keese-eyeball.where: Rare drop from any Keese when defeated.

lizalfos-tail.where: Dropped by Lizalfos (tail drop rates vary by Lizalfos type; higher-tier Lizalfos tend to drop them more often).

lizalfos-talon.where: Drop from Lizalfos; easy in Lanayru marshes.

luminous-stone.where: Mine from Luminous Stone Deposits (they glow at night) or from Luminous Stone Talus drops.

lynel-guts.where: Rare drop from Lynels in high-level regions.

lynel-horn.where: Common Lynel drop; even basic Lynels carry them.

moblin-guts.where: Rare Moblin drop from blue/black/silver variants.

molduga-fin.where: Dropped by Molduga minibosses in Gerudo Desert.

naydras-claw.where: Shoot Naydra's claw (Mount Lanayru / Lanayru Promenade are common farming routes).

naydras-scale.where: Shoot Naydra's body (Mount Lanayru / Lanayru Promenade are common farming routes).

octo-balloon.where: Dropped by Octoroks, usually near water (rivers, lakes, and coastal areas).

octorok-eyeball.where: Rare drop from Octoroks of any type.

octorok-tentacle.where: Common Octorok drop near rivers and seas.

opal.where: Found in Ore Deposits / Rare Ore Deposits and as Stone Talus drops. Can also be bought from the Goron merchant Kairo near Foothill Stable.

red-chuchu-jelly.where: Burn Chuchu Jelly or defeat Fire Chuchu.

red-lizalfos-tail.where: Dropped by Fire Lizalfos around Eldin.

ruby.where: Ore deposits in Eldin and Gerudo; Talus drops.

rushroom.where: Grows on cliffsides across Hyrule; plentiful in Gerudo Highlands.

sapphire.where: Ore deposits in Hebra and Gerudo Highlands; Talus drops.

shard-of-dinraals-fang.where: Shoot Dinraal's mouth (fang) during its route (Eldin Great Skeleton → Tanagar Canyon).

shard-of-dinraals-horn.where: Shoot Dinraal's horn during its route (Eldin Great Skeleton → Tanagar Canyon).

shard-of-faroshs-fang.where: Shoot Farosh's mouth (fang) (commonly farmed near Lake Floria / Riola Spring, or Lake Hylia in the Faron region).

shard-of-faroshs-horn.where: Shoot Farosh's horn (commonly farmed near Lake Floria / Riola Spring, or Lake Hylia in the Faron region).

shard-of-naydras-fang.where: Shoot Naydra's mouth (fang) (Mount Lanayru / Lanayru Promenade are common farming routes).

shard-of-naydras-horn.where: Shoot Naydra's horn (Mount Lanayru / Lanayru Promenade are common farming routes).

silent-princess.where: Grows near Great Fairy Fountains and around Hyrule Castle.

silent-shroom.where: Found at the base of trees in forests and sometimes in caves (easy spots include the woods south of Kakariko / Dueling Peaks region).

smotherwing-butterfly.where: Flutter near lava in Eldin; approach with fireproof gear.

sneaky-river-snail.where: Found on riverbanks / lake shores near fresh water (notably around Zora's Domain and various rivers/ponds across Hyrule).

star-fragment.where: Falls at night; chase glowing comets on clear evenings.

stealthfin-trout.where: Found in the Great Hyrule Forest—especially Lake Mekar (around Korok Forest) and Lake Saria.

sunset-firefly.where: Appears at night around Kakariko Village houses.

sunshroom.where: Warm areas like Eldin foothills and Gerudo Canyon.

swift-carrot.where: Buy at Kakariko Village or pick in nearby fields.

swift-violet.where: Cliffside flowers in Gerudo Highlands and Hebra.

topaz.where: Ore deposits in Lanayru and Faron; Talus drops.

voltfruit.where: Cacti in Gerudo Desert; also sold in Gerudo Town.

warm-safflina.where: Grows in Gerudo Desert sand dunes.

white-chuchu-jelly.where: Freeze Chuchu Jelly or defeat Ice Chuchu.

yellow-chuchu-jelly.where: Zap Chuchu Jelly or defeat Electric Chuchu.

yellow-lizalfos-tail.where: Dropped by Electric Lizalfos around Gerudo Desert.
